name: The Facility (itch) (MagnusStrom)
description:
THE FACILITY

CODED IN HAXE

Made for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam #22

Escape the facility, but is it unescapable? The developer would like you to think so.  Beat 23 levels, each one harder than the last with something else added to the level. Hide in checkpoints, avoid bullets, and do anything to reach the end.

Okay that was a kinda shit description but THE GAMES RLLY FUN TRY IT

GAME SOURCE WILL NOT BE PUBLIC FOR NOW!! THE CODE IS ASS!!!

ENJOY GAMERS
